div.p: ‘(Village of) … 103 13/64 arurae: wheat 468 43/48 artabae, beans 45 art., kidney-beans 4 1/8 art., for transport 54 … art. of wheat. Of these 101 7/64 ar. are unirrigated, yielding wheat 44 3/16 art., beans 2 1/3 art.; reminder 92 15/16 ar. of land of which the liability was granted, yielding wheat 424 17/24 art., beans 42 2/3 art., kidney-beans 4 1/8 art. (Village of) … 115 … ar.: wheat 895 5/12 art., barley 6 1/8 art., lentils 12 23/24 art. Of these 30 3/16 ar. are unirrigated, yielding wheat 215 5/12 art., barley 1 5/8 art. …

lentils 5 19/24 art. (to be exacted) from unirrigated land; for transport 12 art. of wheat. Total for the 406 31/64 ar. of land apportioned to the village from the territory of other villages, wheat 2, 5 .. art. ...’
